data.title: Widden Stud
data.meta_description: Group winning sprinter. The fastest son of SEBRING - only 1200m Gr1 performing son. Ran the fastest 1000m & 1200m at Flemington all season (2015/16). Outstanding physical. From the immediate family of champion sire of sires MACHIAVELLIAN.
data.text:
1st Dam

LADY SUCCEED, by Brian's Time. 2 wins at 1700m, 1800m in Japan. Half-sister to ESPERERO, SHINKO CALIDO, Best Intent (dam of BRAN), Late Show (dam of LORD CHARMING), Heraklia (dam of FIFTY ONER). Dam of eight foals, five to race, all winners, inc:-

SUPIDO (c by Sebring) Subject horse.

2nd Dam

HYDRO CALIDO, by Nureyev. 3 wins at 1500m, 1600m, Deauville Prix d'Astarté, Gr.2, Saint-Cloud Prix d'Angerville, L, 2d Longchamp Poule d'Essai des Pouliches, Gr.1, Chantilly Prix de Sandringham, Gr.3. Three-quarter-sister to Fomalhaut, Moonlight's Box (dam of BAGO, MAXIOS, BETA), half-sister to COUP DE GENIE (dam of DENEBOLA, LOVING KINDNESS, SNAKE MOUNTAIN, GLIA), EXIT TO NOWHERE, MACHIAVELLIAN, OCEAN OF WISDOM, Houdini's Honey (dam of AWESOME ACT, FASTEST MAGICIAN), Rafina (dam of ADMIRALOFTHEFLEET), Salchow (dam of WAY OF LIGHT). Dam of 14 foals, 9 to race, 8 winners, inc:-

SHINKO CALIDO (Silver Hawk) 3 wins-1 at 2-from 1200m to 2200m, 109,624,000¥, Nakayama RF Radio Nippon Sho St Lite Kinen, L, Tokyo 3YO S., 2d Nakayama Fuji TV Sho Spring S., L, 3d Tokyo Icho S., 4th Nakayama Satsuki Sho, L.

ESPERERO (Forty Niner) 2 wins at 1400m, 1600m, Longchamp Prix de Montretout, L, Saint-Cloud Prix Ksamando, 3d Deauville Prix de Tourgéville, L, Chantilly Prix de Pontarme, L, Louisiana Downs Independence H., L, Maisons-Laffitte Prix de Saint-Patrick, L, 4th Chantilly Prix de la Jonchere, Gr.3. Sire.

Best Intent. Winner at 9¾f in GB. Dam of-

BRAN (Muhaarar) 8 wins from 1200m to 1600m, €83,640, US$667,640, to 2024, Kentucky Downs Turf Sprint S., Gr.2, Santa Anita Daytona S., Gr.3, Siren Lure S., L, Deauville Prix Mamma Mia, 2d Churchill Downs Twin Spires Turf Sprint S., Gr.2, Santa Anita Eddie D S., Gr.2, Saint-Cloud Prix Kendor, ParisLongchamp Prix des Beaux-Arts, 3d Santa Anita Joe Hernandez S., Gr.2, Del Mar Wickerr S., L, Chantilly Prix de la Francilienne, Deauville Prix Irish River, 4th Saint-Cloud Prix Matchem, L.

Late Show. Unplaced. Dam of-

LORD CHARMING (Charm Spirit) 5 wins from 1800m to 2000m, €215,122, to 2023 in France and Germany, Hoppegarten Preis der Deutschen Einheit, Gr.3, Chantilly Prix Le Fabuleux, L, 2d ParisLongchamp Prix du Prince d'Orange, Gr.3, La Coupe de Maisons-Laffitte, Gr.3, Magdeburg Grosser Preis der Landeshauptstadt Magdeburg, Gr.3, Hoppegarten Derby Trial, Gr.3, ParisLongchamp Prix Ridgway, L, 3d Milano Premio Ambrosiano, Gr.3, Krefeld Dr Busch Memorial, Gr.3.

Heraklia. Unraced. Dam of-

FIFTY ONER (Fusaichi Pegasus) 6 wins from 1700m to 2000m, 144,151,000¥, Hanshin Nigawa S., L, Kyoto Antares S., L, Hanshin Maya S., 2d Morioka Mercury Cup, L, 3d Chukyo Tokai TV Hai Tokai S., Gr.2, Nakayama March S., Gr.3, 4th Kyoto Antares S., Gr.3.

Cephalonie. Winner at 2200m in France. Dam of-

ARCTIC GYR - INVINCIBLE DRAGON (H.K.) (Invincible Spirit) 7 wins-1 at 2-from 1200m to 1600m, €66,450, HK$5,856,675, Chantilly Prix de Saint-Patrick, L, HKJC Chinese New Year Cup, Hong Kong Macau Trophy H., Longchamp Prix des Vignes.

FESTIVALE (Invincible Spirit) 2 wins-1 at 2-at 6f, 1m, Royal Ascot Sandringham H., L, 3d Newmarket Nell Gwyn S., Gr.3, York Michael Seely Memorial S., L. Producer.

Simple Magic (Invincible Spirit) Winner at 2, 3d Kempton Sirenia S., Gr.3. Dam of-

SAJIR (Make Believe) 3 wins-2 at 2-to 1400m, €135,840, to 2024, Chantilly Prix Sigy, Gr.3, Prix Saraca, L, Saint-Cloud Prix du Chateau Bouscault, 2d Deauville Prix de Cabourg, Gr.3, 3d ParisLongchamp Prix Paul de Moussac, Gr.3, 4th Deauville Prix Jean Prat, Gr.1.

Moon Mountain. Raced once. Dam of-

EYDON (Olden Times) Winner at 9f, Newmarket Feilden S., L, 4th The Two Thousand Guineas, Gr.1.

Minwah. Unraced. Dam of-

GRANDE DAME (Lope de Vega) 2 wins at 1m, £101,881, Sandown Distaff S., L, 2d Sandown Atalanta S., Gr.3, York Michael Seely Memorial S., L, 3d Newmarket Sun Chariot S., Gr.1.

SEBRING Champion 2YO Colt in Australia in 2007-08. 5 wins at 2, A$2,537,060, STC Golden Slipper S., Gr.1, AJC Sires Produce S., Gr.1, Breeders' P., L, Canonbury S., L, STC Darley Guineas Day 2YO H., 2d AJC Champagne S., Gr.1. He entered stud in Aust. in 2009. Third on Aust. Sires List in 2014-15. Sire of 1193 progeny to race, 856 winners (71.0%), earnings of over $153 million, 82 stakes winners, 78 stakes placegetters, inc.

DISSIDENT (10c, Anabaa, Western Symphony). Horse of the Year in Australia in 2014-15. Champion Sprinter & Older Horse in Australia in 2014-15.7 wins-1 at 2-from 1000m to 1600m, A$2,021,200, ATC Randwick Guineas, Gr.1, All Aged S., Gr.1, VRC Makybe Diva S., Gr.1, MRC Memsie S., Gr.1, CF Orr S., Gr.1, ATC Hobartville S., Gr.2, MRC Blue Diamond Preview (c&g), L, 2d ATC Golden Rose S., Gr.1, MRC Sir Rupert Clarke S., Gr.1, ATC Run to the Rose H., Gr.3, Eskimo Prince S., L, Rosebud H., L, 3d MRC Futurity S., Gr.1, MVRC Australia S., Gr.2, MRC Blue Diamond Prelude (c&g), Gr.3, 4th MRC Caulfield Guineas, Gr.1.
